name: Medical Care
description: MNRC has a medical clinic for Adult & Senior medicine services including: - Preventative services include: physical examinations, cancer screenings, vaccinations and tuberculosis screening, STD screening and treatment - Acute care / “sick” visits, for example: infections, fever, rash, etc. - Chronic Disease Management for: diabetes, high blood pressure, asthma, high cholesterol - Multidisciplinary and Specialty Services: nutrition, behavioral health, dental referrals, podiatry, diabetes educatio
fullDescription: MNRC has a medical clinic for Adult & Senior medicine services including: - Preventative services include: physical examinations, cancer screenings, vaccinations and tuberculosis screening, STD screening and treatment - Acute care / “sick” visits, for example: infections, fever, rash, etc. - Chronic Disease Management for: diabetes, high blood pressure, asthma, high cholesterol - Multidisciplinary and Specialty Services: nutrition, behavioral health, dental referrals, podiatry, diabetes educatio

howToGetIt: For more information, call the clinic nearest to your location. Locations For Appointments, please call: (415) 552-3870
cost: Accepted health insurance: Medi-Cal and Healthy San Francisco
